dict.string: Determines the next set of moves by asking questions about the current state of the level and making a decision from a decision tree built from a history of its previous actions.
Determines the next set of moves by picking random actions unless they trigger a reflex.
Determines the next set of moves by asking questions about the current state of the level and making a decision from a pre-determined decision tree.
Determines the next set of moves by picking the highest value action in a list of random actions.
Determines the next set of moves by picking random actions without any assessement.
Determines the next best move by assessing the game state and using a machine learning model with a decision tree.
